scripts.postinstallscriptos:linux:darwin: cp app/config/config.json.dist app/config/config-development.json && cp app/config/config.json.dist app/config/config-production.json && cp app/config/module.json.dist app/config/module.json && cd app && npm install
scripts.postinstallscriptos:win32: copy app\config\config.json.dist app\config\config-development.json && copy app\config\config.json.dist app\config\config-production.json && copy app\config\module.json.dist app\config\module.json && cd app && npm install
scripts.start:linux:darwin: cd app && export APP_ENVIRONMENT=development && export ELECTRON_DISABLE_SECURITY_WARNINGS=true && ./node_modules/.bin/electron ./main.js --inspect=5858
scripts.start:win32: cd app && set APP_ENVIRONMENT=development&& set ELECTRON_DISABLE_SECURITY_WARNINGS=true && electron .\node_modules\.bin\main.js --inspect=5858
scripts.postpolymer-buildscriptos:linux:darwin: rsync -avh app/build/ build/ --delete && rsync -avh --ignore-existing app/node_modules/ build/es6bundle/node_modules/ --delete && rm -rf app/build && cp app/style/icon/logo.png build/es6bundle/icon.png
scripts.postpolymer-buildscriptos:win32: rsync -avh app\build\ build\ --delete && rsync -avh --ignore-existing app\node_modules\ build\es6bundle\node_modules\ --delete && rmdir /Q /S app\build && copy app\style\icon\logo.png build\es6bundle\icon.png
scripts.clear-all:linux:darwin: rm -rf app/node_modules && rm -rf build && rm -rf releases
scripts.clear-all:win32: rmdir /Q /S  app\node_modules && rmdir /Q /S build && rmdir /Q /S releases
